The Mines of Moria (2): The Bridge

wikitext.*:
'''The Bridge of Khazad-dûm''' can refer to the following:
==Middle-earth==
* '''The [[Bridge of Khazad-dûm]], a defensive line of [[Moria]].'''
==Books==
* '''''[[The Bridge of Khazad-dûm]]'', the fifth chapter of the second book of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.'''
* ''[[The Mines of Moria (2): The Bridge]]'', the tenth chapter of ''[[The Treason of Isengard]]''.
==Adaptations==
* "[[The Bridge of Khazad-dûm (scene)|The Bridge of Khazad-dûm]]", a scene from the [[2001]] film ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* ''[[The Bridge of Khazad-dûm (soundtrack)|The Bridge of Khazad-dûm]]'', the thirteenth track of the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack|Original Soundtrack]] to ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
